notes.text: Clarity about what matters provides clarity about what does not.
If you don’t produce, you won’t thrive—no matter how skilled or talented you are.
The ability to perform deep work is becoming increasingly rare and increasingly valuable.
JavaScript is the world’s most misunderstood programming language.
The good parts are the parts that can be used without causing harm.
Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication—even in code.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari

notes.text: You could never convince a monkey to give you a banana by promising him limitless bananas after death.
Homo sapiens rules the world because it is the only animal that can believe in things that exist purely in its imagination.
Culture is more important than genes in shaping human societies.
Truth can only be found in one place: the code.
Leave the campground cleaner than you found it.
Clean code always looks like it was written by someone who cares.
You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems.
Habits are the compound interest of self-improvement.
Every action you take is a vote for the type of person you wish to become.
It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.
Vanity and pride are different things, though the words are often used synonymously.
I could easily forgive his pride, if he had not mortified mine.
Big Brother is Watching You.
War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.
If you want to keep a secret, you must also hide it from yourself.
You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view.
The one thing that doesn’t abide by majority rule is a person’s conscience.
Mockingbirds don’t do one thing but make music for us to enjoy.
Call me Ishmael.
From hell’s heart I stab at thee; for hate’s sake I spit my last breath at thee.
It is not down on any map; true places never are.
So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past.
I hope she'll be a fool — that’s the best thing a girl can be in this world, a beautiful little fool.
Can’t repeat the past? Why of course you can!
